title: Manage Maintenance Backlog
description: A maintenance superintendent reviews the backlog of open work orders to prioritize them and ensure the most critical work is done first.

tasks.description: Generate a report of all open and unassigned work orders from the CMMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of all backlogged work is generated.

tasks.description: Review each work order and assign it a priority based on its safety and production criticality.
tasks.expected_outcome: All work orders in the backlog are prioritized.

tasks.description: Develop the maintenance schedule for the upcoming week, ensuring that the highest priority work from the backlog is included.
tasks.expected_outcome: The weekly schedule is created, effectively managing the backlog and focusing resources on the most important jobs.
